name: simple-dijs
description: Simple Javascript Dependency Injection Container (DI) like Pimple

scripts.test: bash -c 'node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint di.js test/di.js' && bash -c 'node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha'
scripts.browser: bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/browserify di.js --standalone Di -o browser/di.js' && bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs --compress -o browser/di.min.js -- browser/di.js'
scripts.build: npm run browser && npm run test && npm run doc

author: Aubin VIGHIER
